import React from 'react'; import Huge from '../components/Huge'; import Content from '../components/Content'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import { FaLink } from "react-icons/fa"; function ProjectsSection(props) { return(

Multilingual Search Engine (2020)

Twitter, Python, ReactJS, Flask, Material-UI, AWS, Apache Solr, Google Charts
  • Built a search engine web application to retrieve tweets to user queries and to predict the political trend in specified countries.
  • Content ingestion, topic categorization, NLP based sentiment analysis and analytics on google charts were performed.
  • UI was built using ReactJS , Material-UI and Flask.
  • The political trends were visualized with Google charts.
  • Hosted the website in AWS EC2 instance.

Deliverable: Successfully automated Oracle Cloud Application to generate ERP services (generating purchases, invoices ,receipts and updating on the availability of goods) to the users.

AES Technologies - India. (2017)

Internship

Project Title: Cafeteria Management Application

Project Details:
  • Stepped into the world of Web development and played with CSS styling , HTML tags and Javascript during the internship.

Deliverable: Built a Cafeteria Management system for students in an organization which allows transactions with card points stored in the Oracle cloud and it also displays each day's menu in real time.
); } export default ProjectsSection;
